meanings.meaning_en_US: A tool used for removing marks made by pencils.

examples.sentence: I used an [eraser] to fix my mistakes.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我用橡皮擦修改我的錯誤。

examples.sentence: This [eraser] is very effective.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個橡皮擦非常有效。

examples.sentence: Don’t forget to bring an [eraser] for the exam.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 考試時不要忘記帶橡皮擦。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Used to indicate the time on the hour.

examples.sentence: The meeting starts at 3 [o’clock].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 會議在三點整開始。

examples.sentence: Please be here by 10 [o’clock].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請在十點整前到這裡。

examples.sentence: It is 5 [o’clock] now.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 現在是五點整。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A car for hire with a driver, used to transport passengers.

examples.sentence: We took a [taxicab] to the airport.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們搭出租車去機場。

examples.sentence: The [taxicab] was waiting outside.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 出租車在外面等候。

examples.sentence: He hailed a [taxicab] on the street.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在街上叫了一輛出租車。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The reflexive form of 'they', used when the subject and the object are the same.

examples.sentence: They should take care of [themselves].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們應該照顧他們自己。

examples.sentence: The children played by [themselves].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 孩子們自己玩。

examples.sentence: They prepared the meal by [themselves].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們自己準備了這頓飯。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A casual shirt with short sleeves and no collar, typically made of cotton.

examples.sentence: He wore a red [T-shirt] to the party.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他穿了一件紅色的 T 恤參加派對。

examples.sentence: My favorite [T-shirt] has a cool design.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我最喜歡的 T 恤有一個酷酷的設計。

examples.sentence: She bought a new [T-shirt] from the store.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在商店買了一件新的 T 恤。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The ordinal number corresponding to the number thirty.

examples.sentence: He finished in [thirtieth] place in the race.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在比賽中得到第三十名。

examples.sentence: This is her [thirtieth] birthday celebration.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這是她的第三十次生日慶祝。

examples.sentence: They visited the thirtieth floor of the building.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們參觀了這棟建築的第三十層。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The ordinal number corresponding to the number forty.

examples.sentence: She celebrated her [fortieth] anniversary.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她慶祝了她的第四十個週年紀念。

examples.sentence: We are planning a party for his [fortieth] birthday.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們正在為他的第四十個生日計劃派對。

examples.sentence: The book is about the fortieth generation of the family.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這本書是關於這個家庭的第四十代。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The ordinal number corresponding to the number fifty.

examples.sentence: They celebrate their [fiftieth] wedding anniversary.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們慶祝了第五十個結婚紀念日。

examples.sentence: The competition had its [fiftieth] edition this year.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這場競賽今年迎來了第五十屆。

examples.sentence: She is in her [fiftieth] year of life.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她現在是五十歲。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The ordinal number corresponding to the number sixty.

examples.sentence: This is the [sixtieth] episode of the series.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這是這個系列的第六十集。

examples.sentence: We are celebrating our [sixtieth] wedding anniversary.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們正在慶祝我們的第六十個結婚紀念日。

examples.sentence: The [sixtieth] anniversary of the event is next year.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該事件的第六十周年將在明年舉行。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The ordinal number corresponding to the number seventy.

examples.sentence: This year marks my [seventieth] birthday.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 今年是我七十歲的生日。

examples.sentence: They attended their [seventieth] class reunion.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們參加了第七十屆班會。

examples.sentence: The festival is celebrating its [seventieth] anniversary.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該節慶正在慶祝其第七十個周年。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Being number 80 in a sequence.

examples.sentence: The celebration marked her [eightieth] birthday.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這次慶祝活動標誌著她的第八十個生日

examples.sentence: He finished in [eightieth] place in the race.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在比賽中獲得第八十名

examples.sentence: Her [eightieth] anniversary at work is next month.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在工作中的第八十個周年下個月就到了

meanings.meaning_en_US: Being number 90 in a sequence.

examples.sentence: The team celebrated their [ninetieth] win of the season.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該隊慶祝他們本賽季的第九十場勝利

examples.sentence: Her [ninetieth] birthday will be a grand event.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的第九十個生日將是一個盛大的活動

examples.sentence: He was the [ninetieth] person to finish the marathon.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他是完成馬拉松的第九十個人

meanings.meaning_en_US: Being number 100 in a sequence.

examples.sentence: This is her [hundredth] time visiting the museum.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這是她第百次參觀博物館

examples.sentence: They celebrated their [hundredth] anniversary.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們慶祝了第百個周年

examples.sentence: He finished in [hundredth] place in the race.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在比賽中獲得第一百名

meanings.meaning_en_US: Being number 1000 in a sequence.

examples.sentence: She was the [thousandth] customer of the day.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她是今天的第一千位顧客

examples.sentence: The event marked the [thousandth] anniversary of the city.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個事件標誌著這座城市的第一千周年

examples.sentence: He finished in [thousandth] place in the ranking.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在排名中獲得第一千名

meanings.meaning_en_US: Being number 1,000,000 in a sequence.

examples.sentence: She was the [millionth] user to sign up on the platform.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她是平台上第一百萬位註冊用戶

examples.sentence: He reached his [millionth] point in the game.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在遊戲中達到了第一百萬點

examples.sentence: The [millionth] donation helped fund the project.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 第一百萬的捐款幫助資助了這個項目

meanings.meaning_en_US: Being number 1,000,000,000 in a sequence.

examples.sentence: The company celebrated their [billionth] sale.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 公司慶祝了他們的第一十億銷售

examples.sentence: He became the [billionth] visitor to the site.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他成為網站的第一十億位訪客

examples.sentence: They marked their [billionth] transaction this year.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們今年標誌著第一十億筆交易

meanings.meaning_en_US: To go to see someone or something for a short time.

examples.sentence: I will [visit] my grandmother this weekend.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我這個週末要去拜訪奶奶

examples.sentence: She decided to [visit] the museum.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她決定去造訪博物館

examples.sentence: Can we [visit] the new cafe later?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們可以稍後去造訪新咖啡館嗎？

meanings.meaning_en_US: A person who visits someone or something.

examples.sentence: The museum welcomes each [visitor] with a smile.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 博物館用微笑歡迎每位訪客

examples.sentence: Every [visitor] must register at the front desk.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每位訪客必須在前台登記

examples.sentence: She is a frequent [visitor] to that gallery.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她是那個畫廊的常客

meanings.meaning_en_US: The sound produced by humans or animals when speaking or singing.

examples.sentence: She has a beautiful singing [voice].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她有一個美妙的唱歌聲音

examples.sentence: Listen to the sound of her [voice] in the recording.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 聽聽她在錄音中的聲音

examples.sentence: He raised his [voice] to be heard over the crowd.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他提高了聲音以便在人群中被聽到

meanings.meaning_en_US: To remain in a place until something happens or until someone arrives.

examples.sentence: I will [wait] for you at the entrance.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我會在入口等你

examples.sentence: Please [wait] a moment while I fetch your order.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請等一下，我去取你的訂單

examples.sentence: They will [wait] until the rain stops.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們會等到雨停

meanings.meaning_en_US: To cease to sleep; to become awake.

examples.sentence: I often [wake] up early in the morning.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我經常在早上醒來

examples.sentence: He needs an alarm clock to [wake] him up.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他需要鬧鐘叫醒他

examples.sentence: Did you [wake] him for breakfast?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你有叫他起床吃早餐嗎？

meanings.meaning_en_US: To move at a regular pace by lifting and setting down each foot in turn.

examples.sentence: I like to [walk] in the park every evening.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我喜歡每天晚上在公園裡散步

examples.sentence: Let’s [walk] to the nearest restaurant.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們走到最近的餐廳吧

examples.sentence: Do you prefer to [walk] or ride a bike?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你喜歡走路還是騎自行車？

meanings.meaning_en_US: A continuous vertical brick or stone structure that encloses or divides an area of land.

examples.sentence: He leaned against the [wall].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他靠在牆壁上。

examples.sentence: They painted the [wall] blue.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們把牆壁漆成藍色。

examples.sentence: The garden is separated by a high [wall].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 花園被一面高牆隔開。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To have a desire to possess or do something.

examples.sentence: I [want] to go to the beach.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我想要去海灘。

examples.sentence: She [wants] a new car.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她想要一輛新車。

examples.sentence: They [want] to learn more languages.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們想要學習更多語言。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Having or showing a relaxed, friendly, or enthusiastic attitude.

examples.sentence: The [warm] sunlight felt great on my skin.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 溫暖的陽光在我皮膚上感覺很好。

examples.sentence: She gave me a [warm] smile.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她對我露出了溫暖的微笑。

examples.sentence: He enjoys a [warm] cup of tea.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他喜歡喝一杯溫暖的茶。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To look at or observe attentively over a period of time.

examples.sentence: I like to [watch] movies on weekends.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我喜歡在週末觀看電影。

examples.sentence: They [watched] the sunrise together.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們一起觀看日出。

examples.sentence: She enjoys [watching] birds in the garden.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她喜歡在花園裡觀看鳥類。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A transparent, odorless, tasteless liquid that forms the basis of the fluids of living beings.

examples.sentence: You need to drink enough [water] every day.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你每天需要喝足夠的水。

examples.sentence: The pond has fresh [water].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個池塘裡有新鮮的水。

examples.sentence: They are testing the [water] quality.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們正在檢測水質。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A long body of water curling into an arched form and breaking on the shore.

examples.sentence: The [wave] crashed onto the rocks.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 波浪撞擊在岩石上。

examples.sentence: She made a [wave] to say goodbye.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她揮手告別。

examples.sentence: They watched the big [waves] at the beach.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們在海灘上觀看大波浪。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A method, style, or manner of doing something.

examples.sentence: There is a right [way] to do this.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 有一種正確的方法來做這個。

examples.sentence: Find your own [way] of solving the problem.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 找到你自己解決問題的方法。

examples.sentence: [Ways] of improving communication are essential.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 改善溝通的方式是非常重要的。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Used we as the object of a verb or preposition to refer to the speaker and one or more other people.

examples.sentence: We need to believe in [ourselves].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們需要相信我們自己。

examples.sentence: Let's take care of [ourselves].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 讓我們照顧好自己。

examples.sentence: [Ourselves] are our own worst critics.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們自己是自己最嚴厲的批評者。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Having or showing experience, knowledge, and good judgment.

examples.sentence: It is [wise] to save money for emergencies.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 存錢以備不時之需是明智的。

examples.sentence: He is [wise] beyond his years.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他比他的年齡更加智慧。

examples.sentence: Making [wise] choices is essential for success.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 做出明智的選擇對成功至關重要。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To have a desire for something to happen.

examples.sentence: I [wish] I could travel the world.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我希望我能環遊世界。

examples.sentence: She made a [wish] upon a star.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在星星上許了一個願望。

examples.sentence: [Wishing] for happiness is common.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 渴望幸福是很常見的。

meanings.meaning_en_US: In the company of; accompanied by.

examples.sentence: I went to the movies [with] my friends.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我和朋友一起去看電影。

examples.sentence: She is studying [with] a professor.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她和一位教授一起學習。

examples.sentence: You can come [with] us if you like.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 如果你願意，可以和我們一起來。

meanings.meaning_en_US: In the absence of; not having.

examples.sentence: I can't live [without] my phone.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我無法沒有我的手機生活。

examples.sentence: She finished the project [without] any help.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在沒有任何幫助的情況下完成了這個項目。

examples.sentence: Living [without] fear is important.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 沒有恐懼地生活非常重要。

meanings.meaning_en_US: An adult female human being.

examples.sentence: The [woman] in the red dress is my aunt.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 穿紅色連衣裙的那位女性是我的阿姨。

examples.sentence: Every [woman] deserves respect.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每一位女性都應該受到尊重。

examples.sentence: The [woman] gave a powerful speech.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 那位女性發表了一場強有力的演講。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Inspiring a feeling of wonder or delight.

examples.sentence: The sunset was truly [wonderful].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 日落真是令人驚嘆。

examples.sentence: She has a [wonderful] sense of humor.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的幽默感真是太棒了。

examples.sentence: It's a [wonderful] day to be outside.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 今天是戶外活動的好日子。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A single distinct meaningful element of speech or writing.

examples.sentence: Please write down a new [word] every day.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請每天寫下新的字詞。

examples.sentence: He couldn't find the right [word] to express his feelings.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他找不到合適的字詞來表達他的感受。

examples.sentence: A picture is worth a thousand [words].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 一幅圖片勝過千言萬語。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To be engaged in physical or mental activity in order to achieve a result.

examples.sentence: She will [work] on her project tonight.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她今晚將繼續進行她的項目。

examples.sentence: He needs to [work] harder to succeed.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他需要更加努力地工作才能成功。

examples.sentence: They [work] together as a team.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們作為一個團隊一起工作。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A person who works, especially one who does manual or unskilled work.

examples.sentence: Every [worker] deserves fair wages.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每位工作者都應該獲得公平的工資。

examples.sentence: The factory employs over 200 [workers].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這家工廠雇用了超過200名工人。

examples.sentence: She is a skilled [worker] in her field.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在她的領域是一位技術熟練的工作者。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The earth, together with all of its countries, peoples, and natural features.

examples.sentence: The [world] is facing many challenges.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 世界正面臨許多挑戰。

examples.sentence: She traveled around the [world] last year.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她去年環遊了世界。

examples.sentence: He wants to make a difference in the [world].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他想在世界上有所作為。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To feel anxious or concerned about something.

examples.sentence: I tend to [worry] about the little things.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我常常擔心小事。

examples.sentence: Don't [worry], everything will be fine.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 別擔心，一切會好的。

examples.sentence: She worries that she might fail the exam.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她擔心自己可能會考不及格。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To compose text or produce written material.

examples.sentence: I will [write] a letter to my friend.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我會給我的朋友寫一封信。

examples.sentence: Can you [write] down the instructions?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你能把指示寫下來嗎？

examples.sentence: She loves to [write] stories during her free time.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她喜歡在空閒時間寫故事。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A person who writes, especially as an occupation.

examples.sentence: She is an accomplished [writer] of fiction.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她是一位成就斐然的小說作家。

examples.sentence: Many famous [writers] struggled in their early careers.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 許多著名作家在早期職業生涯中都經歷了掙扎。

examples.sentence: The [writer] received an award for her latest book.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這位作家因其最新書籍而獲獎。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Not correct or true; mistaken.

examples.sentence: You are [wrong] if you think that’s the answer.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 如果你認為那是答案，你就是錯的。

examples.sentence: It's [wrong] to judge others without understanding.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在不理解的情況下評判他人是錯誤的。

examples.sentence: He realized he had made a [wrong] decision.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他意識到自己做了一個錯誤的決定。

meanings.meaning_en_US: An area of land, typically for the purpose of gardening or recreation.

examples.sentence: The kids played in the front [yard].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 孩子們在前院裡玩。

examples.sentence: She has a beautiful garden in her [yard].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的院子裡有一個美麗的花園。

examples.sentence: They built a swing in the [yard].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們在院子裡搭建了一個秋千。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Guidance or recommendations offered with regard to prudent future action.

examples.sentence: She gave me some great [advice] about my career.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她給了我一些很好的職業建議。

examples.sentence: It's wise to ask for [advice] before making big decisions.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在做出重大決定之前尋求建議是明智的。

examples.sentence: His [advice] was invaluable to me.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他的建議對我來說是無價之寶。

meanings.meaning_en_US: An event or sequence of events of a specified kind.

examples.sentence: The wedding was a grand [affair].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這場婚禮是個盛大的事件。

examples.sentence: The political [affair] received widespread media coverage.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這起政治事件獲得了廣泛的媒體報導。

examples.sentence: His complicated love [affair] made headlines.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他複雜的愛情事件成為了頭條新聞。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To have an influence on or make a change in.

examples.sentence: The weather can greatly [affect] your mood.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 天氣會大大影響你的心情。

examples.sentence: His actions [affect] those around him.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他的行為影響著他周圍的人。

examples.sentence: Education [affects] future opportunities.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 教育影響未來的機會。

meanings.meaning_en_US: In opposition to.

examples.sentence: She stood [against] the wall.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她靠在牆上。

examples.sentence: They campaigned [against] the new law.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們對新法律進行了反對運動。

examples.sentence: He spoke [against] injustice.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他發言反對不公正。

meanings.meaning_en_US: In or toward the front.

examples.sentence: The road [ahead] is clear.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 前面的道路是暢通的。

examples.sentence: She has a bright future [ahead].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的未來光明可期。

examples.sentence: Keep your eyes [ahead] while driving.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 開車時保持眼睛注視前方。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Help or support.

examples.sentence: She provided [aid] to the victims.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她對受害者提供了援助。

examples.sentence: The organization sends [aid] to disaster areas.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該組織向災區提供援助。

examples.sentence: Financial [aid] is available for students.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 學生可以獲得財務援助。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To direct a goal or purpose towards something.

examples.sentence: He aims [to become] a doctor.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他的目標是成為一名醫生。

examples.sentence: The project aims [to improve] education.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個項目的目標是改善教育。

examples.sentence: They aim [for success] in their careers.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們的目標是在職業上取得成功。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Any machine that is able to fly by gaining support from the air.

examples.sentence: The [aircraft] took off smoothly from the runway.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 飛行器平穩地從跑道起飛

examples.sentence: There are many types of [aircraft], including airplanes and helicopters.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 有許多種類的飛行器，包括飛機和直升機

examples.sentence: The military deploys various [aircraft] during operations.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 軍方在行動中部署各種飛行器

meanings.meaning_en_US: A device that makes a loud noise to warn people of danger or an emergency.

examples.sentence: The [alarm] rang loudly to alert everyone of the fire.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 警報器大聲響起以警告大家火災

examples.sentence: He set the [alarm] for 6:00 AM to wake up on time.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他把警報器設置為早上六點以準時起床

examples.sentence: The security [alarm] went off when the door was opened.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 當門被打開時，安全警報器響起

meanings.meaning_en_US: A collection of recordings or photographs, typically in book form.

examples.sentence: She created a photo [album] to commemorate their trip.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她製作了一本相簿來紀念他們的旅行

examples.sentence: His latest music [album] topped the charts.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他最新的音樂專輯登上了榜單

examples.sentence: They flipped through the old family [album] together.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們一起翻看舊的家庭相簿

meanings.meaning_en_US: Similar to; having qualities or characteristics in common.

examples.sentence: The twins look so [alike] that it’s hard to tell them apart.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這對雙胞胎看起來如此相似，以至於很難區分他們

examples.sentence: These two proposals are quite [alike] in nature.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這兩個提議在本質上相當相似

examples.sentence: Though they have different styles, their art is [alike] in theme.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 雖然他們的風格不同，但他們的藝術在主題上是相似的

meanings.meaning_en_US: Having life; living; not dead.

examples.sentence: The plant is still [alive] despite the harsh winter.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 雖然嚴冬，這植物依然活著

examples.sentence: He felt [alive] when he traveled to new places.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 當他去新的地方時，他感到活著

examples.sentence: She hugged her pet to feel the warmth of something [alive].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她擁抱她的寵物，以感受某種活著的溫暖

meanings.meaning_en_US: Not accompanied by others; on one's own.

examples.sentence: She prefers to work [alone] during her study time.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她喜歡在學習時間獨自工作

examples.sentence: Being [alone] can sometimes be peaceful.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 獨處有時可以是平靜的

examples.sentence: He felt [alone] in a crowd of people.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在人群中他感到孤獨

meanings.meaning_en_US: In a voice that can be clearly heard; out loud.

examples.sentence: She read the poem [aloud] to the class.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她大聲朗讀這首詩給班上聽。

examples.sentence: Please say your name [aloud].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請大聲說出你的名字。

examples.sentence: He laughed [aloud] at the joke.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他聽到笑話後大聲笑了。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Completely; in total.

examples.sentence: Altogether, we need ten more chairs.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 總共，我們需要十把椅子。

examples.sentence: She was altogether surprised by the news.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她對這個消息完全感到驚訝。

examples.sentence: The project was altogether successful.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個項目完全成功。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Lacking physical strength; not strong.

examples.sentence: He felt too [weak] to continue the race.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他感到太虛弱，無法繼續比賽。

examples.sentence: The bridge was deemed structurally [weak].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這座橋被認為結構上很虛弱。

examples.sentence: Her [weak] voice could barely be heard.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的聲音虛弱到幾乎無法聽到。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To have clothing, jewelry, etc. on one's body.

examples.sentence: I like to [wear] comfortable clothes.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我喜歡穿舒適的衣服。

examples.sentence: He decided to [wear] a suit for the interview.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他決定在面試時穿西裝。

examples.sentence: She always [wears] a smile.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她總是帶著微笑。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The state of the atmosphere at a place and time, including temperature, precipitation, and wind.

examples.sentence: The [weather] is beautiful today.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 今天的天氣很好。

examples.sentence: We should check the [weather] before planning the trip.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在計劃旅行之前，我們應該查看天氣。

examples.sentence: Bad [weather] can delay flights.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 惡劣的天氣會延遲航班。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A period of seven days.

examples.sentence: There are seven days in a [week].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 一周有七天。

examples.sentence: I work five days a [week].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我每周工作五天。

examples.sentence: Next [week], we will have a meeting.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 下周我們將有一個會議。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The period from Friday evening through Sunday evening, especially regarded as a time for relaxation or recreation.

examples.sentence: I always look forward to the [weekend].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我總是期待週末。

examples.sentence: We plan to go hiking this [weekend].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們計劃這個週末去爬山。

examples.sentence: The [weekend] is a great time to relax.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 週末是放鬆的好時光。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Glad to see or receive someone or something.

examples.sentence: You are [welcome] to join us for dinner.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你可以來我們家吃晚餐。

examples.sentence: His ideas were [welcome] at the meeting.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他的想法在會議上受到歡迎。

examples.sentence: They gave her a [welcome] hug.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們給了她一個受歡迎的擁抱。

meanings.meaning_en_US: In a good or satisfactory way.

examples.sentence: She sings very [well].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她唱得很好。

examples.sentence: He performed [well] on his exams.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他考試的表現很好。

examples.sentence: Everything is going [well] so far.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 到目前為止一切都很順利。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The direction toward the left of a person facing north, 270 degrees on a compass.

examples.sentence: The sun sets in the [west].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 太陽在西方落下。

examples.sentence: We traveled [west] to reach the coast.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們向西旅行，抵達了海岸。

examples.sentence: He lives [west] of the city.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他住在城市的西邊。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Covered or saturated with liquid, especially water.

examples.sentence: The ground was [wet] after the rain.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 雨後地面變得潮濕。

examples.sentence: I forgot my [wet] umbrella at home.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我忘了把潮濕的雨傘放在家裡。

examples.sentence: His clothes got [wet] in the storm.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他的衣服在暴風雨中淋濕了。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Used to ask for information about something.

examples.sentence: What do you want to eat?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你想吃什麼？

examples.sentence: What is your favorite color?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你最喜歡的顏色是什麼？

examples.sentence: What happened last night?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 昨晚發生了什麼？

meanings.meaning_en_US: At what time.

examples.sentence: I remember the day [when] we first met.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我記得我們第一次見面的那一天

examples.sentence: Please let me know [when] you arrive.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請告訴我你什麼時候到達

examples.sentence: Do you know [when] the event starts?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你知道活動什麼時候開始嗎？

meanings.meaning_en_US: In or to what place or position.

examples.sentence: Do you know [where] she is?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你知道她在哪裡嗎？

examples.sentence: This is the place [where] I grew up.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這是我長大的地方

examples.sentence: Tell me [where] I can find the book.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 告訴我我可以在哪裡找到書

meanings.meaning_en_US: Indicating a choice between alternatives.

examples.sentence: I can't decide [whether] to go or stay.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我無法決定是去還是留

examples.sentence: She asked [whether] I wanted tea or coffee.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她問我想要茶還是咖啡

examples.sentence: It’s unclear [whether] he will attend the meeting.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 不清楚他是否會參加會議

meanings.meaning_en_US: A question word used to ask about one or more items from a defined set.

examples.sentence: Do you know [which] book he prefers?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你知道他偏好哪本書嗎？

examples.sentence: I can't remember [which] way to go.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我記不起來該走哪條路

examples.sentence: She asked [which] dress to wear.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她問該穿哪條裙子

meanings.meaning_en_US: During the time that.

examples.sentence: [While] I was reading, she was cooking.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我在閱讀的時候，她在做飯

examples.sentence: You can play [while] I work.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你可以在我工作時玩

examples.sentence: I thought about it [while] walking.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我在散步的時候想到了這件事

meanings.meaning_en_US: Of the color of pure snow or milk.

examples.sentence: The walls are painted [white].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 牆壁刷成了白色

examples.sentence: She wore a [white] dress to the party.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她穿著一條白色裙子參加派對

examples.sentence: I prefer [white] bread to brown.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我喜歡白麵包勝於棕色麵包

meanings.meaning_en_US: Having a great extent from side to side.

examples.sentence: The river is very [wide] at this point.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個地方的河流非常寬

examples.sentence: She has a [wide] range of interests.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她有廣泛的興趣

examples.sentence: The road gets [wide] near the bridge.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在橋附近，這條路變得寬廣

meanings.meaning_en_US: A married woman, especially in relation to her spouse.

examples.sentence: She is his [wife] and best friend.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她是他的妻子和最好的朋友

examples.sentence: Every husband should respect their [wife].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每位丈夫都應該尊重自己的妻子

examples.sentence: They have been [wife] and husband for ten years.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們已經當了十年的夫妻

meanings.meaning_en_US: Expressing the future tense or intention.

examples.sentence: I [will] go to the store tomorrow.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我明天會去商店

examples.sentence: She [will] finish her homework later.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她稍後會完成她的作業

examples.sentence: They [will] join us for dinner.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們會和我們一起吃晚餐

meanings.meaning_en_US: To be successful or victorious in a contest or conflict.

examples.sentence: He hopes to [win] the championship.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他希望贏得冠軍

examples.sentence: They [win] every match this season.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們這個賽季每場比賽都贏了

examples.sentence: To [win], you need to train hard.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 想要贏，你必須努力訓練

meanings.meaning_en_US: The perceptible natural movement of the air.

examples.sentence: The [wind] was howling through the trees.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 風在樹間呼嘯

examples.sentence: She felt the cool [wind] on her face.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她感受到涼爽的風撫過臉龐

examples.sentence: The [wind] changed direction suddenly.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 風向突然改變了

meanings.meaning_en_US: An opening in the wall of a building, typically covered with glass.

examples.sentence: She looked out the [window] to see the view.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她透過窗戶看外面的景色

examples.sentence: Please close the [window] if it gets cold.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 如果冷的話請關上窗戶

examples.sentence: The [window] was covered in frost.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 窗戶上覆蓋著霜

meanings.meaning_en_US: A period of 365 days (or 366 days in a leap year) starting from January 1 to December 31.

examples.sentence: This [year] has been very challenging for many people.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這一年對許多人來說非常具有挑戰性。

examples.sentence: In one [year], I plan to travel around the world.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在一年內，我計劃環遊世界。

examples.sentence: Every [year], we celebrate the New Year with fireworks.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每年我們都用煙火慶祝新年。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A color like that of ripe lemons or sunflowers, between green and orange in the spectrum.

examples.sentence: The walls are painted in a bright [yellow].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 牆壁刷成了明亮的黃色。

examples.sentence: She wore a [yellow] dress to the party.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她穿了一件黃色的裙子去派對。

examples.sentence: Bananas are typically [yellow] when they are ripe.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 香蕉在成熟時通常是黃色的。

meanings.meaning_en_US: An informal way of saying 'yes'.

examples.sentence: Are you coming to the party? [Yeah], I wouldn't miss it!
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你要來派對嗎？是的，我不會錯過的！

examples.sentence: [Yeah], I agree with your opinion.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 是的，我同意你的看法。

examples.sentence: When I asked him for help, he said, '[Yeah], sure!'
examples.translation_zh_TW: 當我問他幫忙時，他說：‘是的，當然可以！’

meanings.meaning_en_US: On the day before today.

examples.sentence: We went to the beach [yesterday].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們昨天去了海灘。

examples.sentence: I finished the book [yesterday].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我昨天完成了這本書。

examples.sentence: She called me [yesterday] to discuss the plans.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她昨天打電話給我討論計劃。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Up until the present or a specified time; still.

examples.sentence: I have not finished my homework [yet].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我還沒有完成我的作業。

examples.sentence: Are you [yet] to visit that restaurant?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你還沒去過那家餐廳嗎？

examples.sentence: She hasn’t decided what to wear [yet].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她還沒決定穿什麼。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Used to refer to the person being addressed.

examples.sentence: You should take care of [yourself].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你應該照顧好你自己。

examples.sentence: Did you enjoy the movie by [yourself]?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你一個人享受那部電影嗎？

examples.sentence: Have confidence in [yourself].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 要對你自己有信心。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The reflexive form of 'you' used to refer to the person or persons being addressed.

examples.sentence: You need to take care of [yourselves].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你們需要照顧好自己。

examples.sentence: Be true to [yourselves] and follow your dreams.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 忠於自己，追隨你的夢想。

examples.sentence: Just remind [yourselves] that you are capable.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 只是提醒你們自己，你們是有能力的。

meanings.meaning_en_US: In the midst of or surrounded by something.

examples.sentence: She felt at home [among] her friends.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在朋友之中感到像在家裡。

examples.sentence: He was standing [among] the crowd.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他站在人群之中。

examples.sentence: This place is hidden [among] the trees.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個地方隱藏在樹木之中。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A quantity of something, typically measured.

examples.sentence: The total [amount] due is $50.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 應付的總金額是50美元。

examples.sentence: Please specify the [amount] needed.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請具體說明所需的數量。

examples.sentence: He was surprised by the [amount] of work required.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他對所需的工作量感到驚訝。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Belonging to the very distant past and no longer in existence.

examples.sentence: The [ancient] ruins tell a story of the past.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這些古老的遺跡講述著過去的故事。

examples.sentence: They discovered [ancient] artifacts during the excavation.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們在挖掘中發現了古老的文物。

examples.sentence: This temple is an example of [ancient] architecture.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這座寺廟是古老建築的例子。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A strong feeling of annoyance, displeasure, or hostility.

examples.sentence: His [anger] was palpable in the room.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他的憤怒在房間裡是明顯的。

examples.sentence: She struggled to control her [anger].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她努力控制她的憤怒。

examples.sentence: Expressing [anger] can sometimes be useful.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 表達憤怒有時是有用的。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The space between two intersecting lines or surfaces at or close to the point where they meet.

examples.sentence: You need to measure the [angle] accurately.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你需要準確地測量這個角度。

examples.sentence: From this [angle], the view is stunning.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 從這個角度看，風景非常迷人。

examples.sentence: The architect considered every [angle] of the design.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 建築師考慮到了設計的每一個角度。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The joint connecting the foot with the leg.

examples.sentence: She twisted her [ankle] while running.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在跑步時扭傷了踝關節

examples.sentence: The doctor examined her swollen [ankle].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 醫生檢查了她腫脹的踝關節

examples.sentence: He put ice on his injured [ankle].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在受傷的踝關節上放了冰

meanings.meaning_en_US: At any time.

examples.sentence: You can call me [anytime].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你可以隨時打電話給我

examples.sentence: She is available [anytime] during the week.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在週內隨時都有空

examples.sentence: Feel free to drop by [anytime].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 隨時來訪都可以

meanings.meaning_en_US: In any case; regardless of the preceding context.

examples.sentence: I didn't want to go, but I went [anyway].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我不想去，但我還是去了無論如何

examples.sentence: It rained, but we had fun [anyway].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 雖然下雨，但我們還是玩得很開心

examples.sentence: He said it was too late, but I called [anyway].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他說太晚了，但我還是打了電話

meanings.meaning_en_US: In or at any place.

examples.sentence: You can find this book [anywhere].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你可以在任何地方找到這本書

examples.sentence: He can travel [anywhere] he likes.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他可以去他喜歡的任何地方

examples.sentence: There isn't [anywhere] else I'd rather be.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我不想待在任何其他地方

meanings.meaning_en_US: In or at any place.

examples.sentence: I can work from [anyplace].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我可以在任何地方工作

examples.sentence: You can park your car [anyplace] here.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你可以在這裡的任何地方停車

examples.sentence: I would like to travel [anyplace] exciting.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我想去任何有趣的地方旅行

meanings.meaning_en_US: A large primate that includes gorillas, chimpanzees, and orangutans.

examples.sentence: The [ape] swung from tree to tree.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 猿類從樹上擺盪到樹上

examples.sentence: An [ape] can use tools just like humans.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 猿類可以像人類一樣使用工具

examples.sentence: He watched the [ape] at the zoo.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在動物園觀察那只猿
